mapper.select: SELECT id, wh_id, receiving_time, receiving_no, carrier_no, carrier, order_id, customer_id, supplier_id, ctns, receiving_remark, inner_org_id FROM receiving where id = #{id}
SELECT id, wh_id, receiving_time, receiving_no, carrier_no, carrier, order_id, customer_id, supplier_id, ctns, receiving_remark, inner_org_id FROM receiving where 1 = 1
